name: Memory Match - Candy Edition
description:
A candy themed memory matching game for children to adults.

Candy Match is a simple fun memory game to play and help improve memory and visual skills. Since we are always growing and need to nourish this growth with productive stimulants. This game does that and more!


<<>>

Over 70 different candies to match!
Easy to use game buttons that make navigation easy for everyone!

Sounds with each action!

Music and Sound controls allow for parents to set the volumes of the game! 


>>>Arcade Mode<<<
Three (3) different difficulties
Easy: 6 Tiles
Medium: 12 Tiles
Hard: 24 Tiles


>>>Story Mode<<<
Play through 60 levels, gain stars for how well you can remember!

Difficulty increases every 6 levels up to 24 tiles.



>>>How to Play<<< 
>Start the game by clicking on the 'Play Button'
>Select which mode you want to play
>Select the level you want to play

>Click on the squares to find their pairs
>Remember what each square has underneath so you may find the same Candy!
>Once you find them all, you win!

Improve your brain and skills with this simple yet difficult matching game!


We love hearing feedback!
Your feedback is very important to us and allows us to improve our game! Make sure to let us know if there are any bugs or issues!

Happy Matching!
